title: The Continued Saga of Jesse Perring
body: Rumor has it that when Jesse Perring walks in a turrets range, the turret destroys itself.

replies.body: The elo system is designed to see how long a individual would survive against jesse perring, in miliseconds
Jesse Perring doesnt need a keyboard and mouse to play. He just does it to show he is a good sport
when jesse perring tower dives, the turret helps kill his opponent. Not that he ever has to.
The top players are called Challengers because once a year they get to play against Jesse Perring. 30v1. He's still undefeated.
When Jessie Perring plays Taric everyone swears he is broken.
tfw i stumble across a post where its pretty much op just talking to himself *backs away slowly
The items in the shop pay Jesse Perring to be used
9 11 was a result of Jesse playing corki
When Jesse Perring gets a kill. The server is offline for 2 months
When Jesse uses his Karthus ult. 100 people in the Oceania region die.
Jesse Perring has no need for weapons. His enemies kill themself
Annie has tibbers as her pet. jesse perring has baron nashor.
When Cho'Gath ults jesse perring. He kills himslef
